scripts.preinstall: npm ci --prefix server && npm ci --prefix client
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.tools:generate:server:dev: nodemon --watch server/src/presentation/rest -e js,ts -x npm run tools:generate:server
scripts.build:server: npm run build --prefix server && npm run tools:generate:server
scripts.build:client: npm run tools:generate:client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run tools:cp:server && npm run build:client && npm run tools:cp:client
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client" "npm run tools:generate:client:dev" "npm run tools:generate:server:dev"
